title: [Ta'Illistim, Glaendier Wey]
description: The cobblestoned wey widens abruptly as it meets Shimmarglin Court.  The hue and cry from the denizens of the huge plaza echoes off the stone buildings lining the wey.  A trickle of patrons flows to and from a nearby well-kept cottage.

The cobblestoned wey widens abruptly as it meets the edge of Shimmarglin Court.  Perched at the juncture between the road and the open space is a elevated shop, raised up three steps and set with tapered marble columns.
